summaries: Apple unveils new products during their annual event.
Analysts predict high demand for the new iPhone models.
Concerns about supply chain issues affecting production.
Apple shares rally on strong quarterly earnings report.
financial_report: Apple reported better-than-expected earnings this quarter, driven by strong iPhone sales and services growth.

analysis.reasoning: Market reaction was positive due to innovative products.
Analysts express optimism about sales growth.
Supply chain concerns introduce a risk factor.
Strong earnings report boosted investor confidence.
